actions.Multiattack: The blackguard makes three attacks with its glaive or its shortbow.
actions.Glaive: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Shortbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3+1d6 + 0 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Dreadful Aspect (Recharges after a Short: The blackguard exudes magical menace. Each enemy within 30 feet of the blackguard must succeed on a DC 13+1d6 + 10 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If a frightened target ends its turn more than 30 feet away from the blackguard, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
